page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX2a][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
incidents.message: Start Time : 03/11/2024 17:35 UTC End Time : 03/11/2024 17:43 UTC Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2a Service impact : Some datastores were temporarily unavailable. Root cause : This incident was due to network equipment issue. We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Root cause : Hardware failure We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

incidents.name: [ERI][Hosted Private Cloud] - Incident notification
incidents.message: On September 16th 2024 at 11:20 UTC, emergency services have proceeded to evacuate the whole industrial zone where our Erith datacenter is located. The evacuation was ordered due to safety concerns related to a nearby building inside which a fire occurred. At 11:30 today UTC, local authorities have permitted to gain access to our datacenter. Risks have completely been eliminated in the area and return to business as usual is in progress. We are happy to share our teams are now back in the datacenter marking the end of this event. As from the beginning of this incident, teams have been fully committed to make sure there is no impact to services delivered to our customers. Throughout all the event all services were and are operating normally. We take this opportunity to thank local authorities, police, fire brigades, and all respondents, for their ongoing efforts in ensuring everyone' safety. We thank our customers for their patience and remain at their disposal in case they have any question Start Time : 16/09/2024 11:20 UTC End Time : 18/09/2024 11:30 UTC
incidents.timestamp: Sep <var data-var='date'>16</var>, <var data-var='time'>13:39</var> - Sep <var data-var='date'>18</var>, <var data-var='time'>12:04</var> UTC

incidents.message: Start Time : 02/09/2024 15:25 UTC End Time : 02/09/2024 15:45 UTC Technical impact : Customers could not access the Vsphere service. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident
